mapper.select: SELECT pp.id AS id, pp.filename filename, pp.product_album_id product_album_id, pp.created_at created_at FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_album a ON p.picture_album = a.id LEFT JOIN product_pictures pp ON a.id = pp.product_album_id WHERE p.id = #{productId}

SELECT pa.sku_code AS sku_codes, STRING_AGG(CONCAT(pat.name, ':', pa.attribute_value, ' ', pa.attribute_unit), ';') AS attributes FROM product_attribute_category pac LEFT JOIN product_attribute_type pat ON pat.attribute_category_id = pac.id LEFT JOIN product_attribute pa ON pa.attribute_type_id = pat.id WHERE pa.product_id = #{productId} GROUP BY pa.sku_code;

SELECT pat.name AS attribute_type_name, pat.id AS attribute_type_id FROM product_attribute_category pac LEFT JOIN product_attribute_type pat ON pat.attribute_category_id = pac.id WHERE pac.name = #{categoryName}
